name: Alien Survival Game
description:
The goal is simple: Survive. Don’t touch the shapes, but the over-the-top illusions of shadows add an additional layer of difficulty.
Collect hidden stars. Solve challenging puzzles and rise higher to avoid what lies beneath the shade.

FEATURES
• Dozens of Challenging Puzzles to Solve
• Cool Shadow Illusion & Haunting Special Effects
• Collect the Hidden Stars!
